title: EEE Research Activities - NSRIT
content: Search for: EEE Research Activities NSRIT > Electrical & Electronics Engineering > EEE Research Activities Department Profile About the Department EEE-Magazines Faculty Faculty List Faculty Participations & Achievements Student’s Corner Roll of Honour Academic Toppers Academic Projects EEE-Skill Oriented Courses Professional Societies – Activities Co-Curricular Activities Technical Clubs Extracurricular Activities Placements Laboratories Program Specific Labs EEE-Industry Supported Laboratories Department Administration Research EEE Publications Projects &Consultancy eee-startups Industrial Interaction Department MOU’s EEE Internships Industrial Visits Learning Resources EEE-Materials EEE-Self Reflection Videos Advanced Learning Alumni Department Gallery Contact Us Department Administration DEPARTMENT RESEARCH COMMITTEE (DRC): Responsibilities: Identify thrust areas and specific topics on which to work further. Identify the faculty who would be working on those areas. Decide if the same can be applied for funding or to request management for funding. Identify funding agencies, forward applications and maintain records. Draw action plan for implementation and monitor the same. The committee shall meet twice in a semester. Committee Members: S.NO DEPARTMENT RESEARCH COMMITTEE(DRC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Member 4 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Member 5 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 6 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mr.A.BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Member DEPARTMENT LIBRARY COMMITTEE (DLC): Responsibilities: Prepare a list of books of relevance and also of Journals/magazines with price for getting them to Library. Obtain necessary approval and plan for procurement. Intimate students/staff regarding availability and new arrivals on regular basis. Maintain accession register and issue register. The committee shall meet twice in a semester. Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT LIBRARY COMMITTEE (DLC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Mr.A.BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Member 4 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Member 5 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Member 6 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Mmeber DEPARTMENT RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE (DRMC): Responsibilities: To receive and attend the parents / guardians in the college. To inform about the low attendance or poor Marks of the students, if any, to the concerned Parents. The committee shall meet Monthly once. Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE (DRMC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Member 4 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Member 5 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 6 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mr.A.BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Member DEPARTMENT GRIEVANCE & REDRESSAL COMMITTEE (DGRC): Responsibilities: The students approach the Cell to voice their grievances regarding academic and non academic matters. The cell redresses the grievances at individual and class level and grievances of common interest. Students are encouraged to use the suggestion box placed on the campus to express constructive suggestions and grievances. Complaints dropped in the ‘Suggestion Box’ by students and oral complaints are also redressed. The Department assures students that once a complaint is made, it will be treated with confidentiality. The committee shall meet Monthly once & whenever required. Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT GRIEVANCE & REDRESSAL COMMITTEE (DGRC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Member 4 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Member 5 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Member 6 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mr.A BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Member DEPARTMENT BUDGET AND RESOURCE COMMITTEE (DBRC): Responsibilities: Get budget for academic year wise and consolidate for submission to accounts. Monitor use of funds and ensure records are maintained both at the lab and office department. Solicit and scrutinize budget for seminars/guest lectures etc., from the organizing faculty before finalizing and keep a record of the same in department. For any additional unexpected resource requirements, plan for getting approval. Discuss and take action for sanction of any additional resource not envisaged in the budget if need arises. The committee shall meet Monthly once Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT BUDGET AND RESOURCE COMMITTEE (DBRC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Member 4 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Member 5 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Member 6 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mr.A.BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Member DEPARTMENT PROJECT REVIEW COMMITTEE (DPRC): Responsibilities: Finalize student groups and topics in IV year I Semester. Review and approve the projects Monitor the progress with student groups three times during the duration of project. Approving project submission. Internal evaluation at the end of the project. Identify best projects. Submit copies of project reports to library. Collect titles and synopsis from faculty and ensure entry of these in Project Compendium. Ensure entry of best projects in Project Arcade. The committee shall meet twice in a semester. Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT PROJECT REVIEW COMMITTEE (DPRC) POSITION 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD Chair 2 Mr.K.M.M.TARAKESH Assistant Professor Coordinator 3 Mr.P.MAHESH Assistant Professor Member 4 Ms.M.SREEDEVI Assistant Professor Member 5 Mr.A.YELLAJI Assistant Professor Member 6 Mrs.V.USHA RANI Assistant Professor Member 7 Mr.A.BALA RAJA RAM Assistant Professor Member PROGRAM ADVISORY COMMITTEE (PAC): Responsibilities: Suggest improvement in academic plans and recommend standard practices/systems for attainment of PEO’s & Encourage for industry-institute interactions to bridge up curriculum/industry gap and suggest quality improvement initiatives to enhance employability. Redefine existing PEO’s, aligning of PEO’s to the mission statements and defining program specific outcomes. To propose necessary action plan for skill development of students, required for entrepreneurship development and quality improvement. To identify and suggest thrust areas to conduct various activities (final year projects, training courses and additional experiments to meet PEO’s). Bringing industry standards in academic in order to bridge gap between industry and academics. Improving department by its structure and its academics by understanding the current and former students need by their parents and alumni respectively and Departmental queries which expects advice to consider enhancing the departmental business process. The committee shall meet yearly twice. Committee Members: S.No DEPARTMENT ADVISORY COMMITTEE (DAC) 1 Dr.R.S.R.KRISHNAM NAIDU Associate Professor & HOD 2 Dr.P.MALLIKARJUNA RAO Professor Andhra University ,Visakhapatnam 3 Mr. Vikas Gupta Electrical Engineer, Hobel Bellows Co 4 Mr. K.S. Ramanjeyulu Assistant Professor 5 Dr. I.E. Sanyasi Naidu Associate Professor, GITAM University 6 Mr. R. Koteswara Rao Assistant Professor, GITAM University 7 Mr. B. Suresh Kumar, Trainer, CEMS 8 Mr. S. S. Rao, Trigeo Technologies 9 Mr. B. Shiva Teja (Alumni) ×
